Name: Average time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection until SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Total time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Unavailable
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Total waiting time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection until any reviewer response (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to lead to a completed reviewer assignment (i.e., at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed without subsequent decline)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Average time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation across variants that include both activities
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection measured until the first SW-Reviewer Agreed in each case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to the final decision point (e.g., SW-Awaiting EIC Decision) in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-EIC Major Revision in cases where at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed follows
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Total time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to Manuscript Export Succeeded in variants that proceed to acceptance after SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and Assign a Different Editor when no SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs within 14 days
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to result in a stable reviewer pool (defined as two consecutive SW-Reviewer Agreed without intervening declines)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper in complex assignment scenarios
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper'
